semanticgenealogy-gedcomexport-desc: Description of the GEDCOM result printer.
semanticgenealogy-gedcomexport-link:
{{Optional}}
Default link label to a GEDCOM file.
semanticgenealogy-specialfamilytree-type:
Label of the search of the closest family link between two people.
{{Identical|Link}}
semanticgenealogy-specialfamilytree-deco:
Label for the simple Decorator name
{{Identical|Simple}}

Label for the boxes Decorator name
{{Identical|Box}}
semanticgenealogy-specialfamilytree-disp:
Label for the full name display mode
{{Identical|Full name}}

Label for the page name display mode
{{Identical|Page name}}
semanticgenealogy-specialfamilytree-labe: Label of the "base person page name" input.

Label of the "second base person page name" input (only for "link" type).

Used in {{msg-mw|Semanticgenealogy-specialfamilytree-error-nosecondpagename}}.

Label of the "type of family tree" select.
{{Identical|Type}}

Label for the decorator styling name
{{Identical|Styling}}
Label for the mode to display the name
Label of the form field in order to input the number of generation in the tree.
Label to show the wiki code to insert
semanticgenealogy-specialfamilytree-erro:
Error message when the "page2" field is not set (only for "link" type).

Refers to {{msg-mw|Semanticgenealogy-specialfamilytree-label-page2}}.
Error message where no link is found between $1 and $2.

Error massage when the type of the family tree is unknown. Parameters:
* $1 - unknown type. Known types are: "ancestors", "descendant", and "link"
